DIR_STATE:["scripts/README_build_runner.md", "scripts/_build_logging.py", "scripts/build_runner.py", "scripts/build_steps.py", "scripts/check_artifact_gate.py", "scripts/ci_expectations.json", "scripts/ci_run.py", "scripts/ci_verify_outputs.py", "scripts/consolidate_outputs.py", "scripts/create_meta_analysis_starter_kit.py", "scripts/docker_healthcheck.sh", "scripts/entrypoint.sh", "scripts/id_mismatch_demo.py", "scripts/logging_utils.py", "scripts/path_utils.py", "scripts/pipeline_runner.py", "scripts/preflight_diagnostics.py", "scripts/preflight_smoke.py", "scripts/record_versions.py", "scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_artifact_gate.py", "scripts/run_tests_with_preflight.sh", "scripts/smoke_test.py", "scripts/toy_meta_analysis.py", "scripts/validate_json.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a strict bash wrapper that runs preflight diagnostics first, fails fast with actionable errors, then executes the provided or default test command.
